```{r setup}
library(linearAlgebra)
```

```{r}
x_i <- matrix(c("a", "b", "b", "c"), ncol = 2)
colnames(x_i) <- rownames(x_i) <- c("v1", "v2")
```

# Vectorize

```{r}
vec(x_i)
```

# Half-Vectorize

```{r}
vech(x_i)
```

# Strict Half-Vectorize

```{r}
vechs(x_i)
```

# Names for Half-Vectorization

```{r}
vechnames(colnames(x_i))
```

# Names for Strict Half-Vectorization

```{r}
vechsnames(colnames(x_i))
```
